name: Haunted Mine
description:
This is my game for Ludum Dare 29. You can't do much things, because I failed a bit to be honest. I didn't have an idea for game in day 1. I also wasn't programming from the time I've submitted game for LD28, so I haven't learned anything. #laziness

The whole idea of this game was that you're a ghost and you have to scare the miners, but in the same time, you can't let them leave the mine or see you.

Thanks to Threef for help and http://kenney.nl for his great assets. :)

Controls:

W,S,A,D - movement
Z - pick up the key
X - throw the key
C - change the sign direction.
